articles.title: Ghost Recon Wildlands and Breakpoint DLC expansions are free for a limited time - TrueAchievements
articles.description: As part of the Ghost Recon 20th anniversary showcase, Ubisoft announced that two DLC expansions, one for Ghost Recon Wildlands and another for Ghost Recon Breakpoint, are now free to download and keep.
